content: Seems something slipped into the mix there.
The next one to get lost might be me.

Oh right, it's Frostia!
Though she doesn't quite fit any of the types above,
she's still really cute.

Don't worry! It's not that big here,
I'll hear you if you shout!
Press <color=#38b6c5>M</color> to open the map and see where Frostia is!
Like just now, when she got the tent, she looked so troubled and unsure, {想象中}and it really made me want to step in and lend a hand!
But, even with the phone map, Frostia got lost. I have no idea where she went...

Hmm... but Mobai asked me to check the differences between the surrounding land and the map,
and the strange mist over the sea, so... Hehe~!

Can you help Frostia? 
Your decision-making was sooo swift,
I'm sure you can give her some great advice.

I've always thought that little things are just so cute!
Like little flowers, grass, flutterbees,
tiny crabs, baby crayfish, and little Glenn.

Hmm, well... I'll look into it.
The map's still good for now!
Press <color=#38b6c5>M</color> to open it and check where Frostia is!
She must have gotten lost because of the differences in the map, right?

Look, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
your tent is set up!
I mean...
